short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevent storing browser history based on keywords you specify!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Prevent browser from storing history based on keywords you specify! 

Features
 - Prevents storing browsing history 
 - On-off extension with single click

You don't need to browse in incognito mode just to avoid storing history. Safe History is here to help you.

Only thing you need to do on installation
 - Mention the keywords which you don't want to store in the browser history.
 - Based on keywords you mentioned Safe History will filter URL containing those keywords and prevent storing into the browser history.

And now you are good to go!
